Class WelcomeController

java.lang.Object
com.kelompok6.bakmi.Controllers.WelcomeController
public class WelcomeController extends Object
Controller for the Welcome screen.

This controller handles the user's selection between Dine-In and Take-Away, prepares and stores the corresponding Customer in Session, and navigates to the customer menu scene (scene2) defined in App.

It also manages a small floating "Admin" button whose visibility is governed by mouse hover events on the root pane.

  • Field Details

    • rootPane

      private javafx.scene.layout.BorderPane rootPane
      Root container of the welcome FXML. Used to detect mouse enter/exit events to show/hide the floating admin button.

    • floatingButton

      private javafx.scene.control.Button floatingButton
      Floating admin button anchored in the welcome layout. Initially hidden; shown when the mouse enters the rootPane and hidden again after a short delay when the mouse leaves.

  • Constructor Details

    • WelcomeController

      public WelcomeController()

  • Method Details

    • initialize

      private void initialize()
      Called by the FXML loader after fields are injected. Initializes UI behavior such as the floating button hover logic.

    • setupFloatingButtonHoverBehavior

      private void setupFloatingButtonHoverBehavior()
      Configures hover behavior for the floatingButton.

      The method attaches mouse listeners to rootPane and the button itself so the button appears when the user moves the mouse into the welcome area and disappears shortly after the mouse leaves. A short PauseTransition is used to avoid flicker when the pointer moves quickly.

    • btnDineInClick

      void btnDineInClick(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
      Handler for the "Makan Disini" button.

      Creates a DineInCustomer with nomorMeja = 0 to indicate the table has not yet been selected, stores it into Session, and switches the primary stage to App.scene2 (customer menu).

      Parameters:
      event - the action event provided by JavaFX

    • btnTakeAwayClick

      void btnTakeAwayClick(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
      Handler for the "Bawa Pulang" button.

      Creates a TakeAwayCustomer, sets a default pickup time of now + 20 minutes, stores it into Session, then navigates to App.scene2 (customer menu).

      Parameters:
      event - the action event provided by JavaFX

    • onFloatingButtonClick

      void onFloatingButtonClick(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
      Handler for the floating "Admin" button.

      Attempts to load the admin FXML from /Fxml/Admin/Admin.fxml and switch the application's primary stage to the admin scene.

      Parameters:
      event - the action event provided by JavaFX
